backend/main.mo: Defines backend actor with data models for attendance, budgets, expenses, reminders, notes, history, and user profiles, including authorization and approval flows.
feature_evidence.json: Lists features, related files, components, and test IDs for approval-flow bug fixes and frontend validation enhancements.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of numerous frontend files including state, UI components, pages, and utilities.
frontend/index.css: Defines global Tailwind-based styles including OKLCH color variables and light/dark theme tokens.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry file setting favicon, title, root div, and script loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app component configuring QueryClient, layout, tabs, sidebar navigation, and feature pages.
frontend/src/components/attendance/Atten: React component for editing a single attendance date with status, times, validation, and save handling.
Renders a monthly attendance calendar with navigation, highlighting today, selected dates, holidays, and attendance entries.
Lets users select a time range and export attendance summaries as a PDF, handling loading and error states.
frontend/src/components/attendance/Holid: Admin-only UI to add, list, and delete holidays for the selected month with dialogs and validation.
frontend/src/components/auth/ApprovalGat: Controls access based on approval and admin status, showing request UI for unapproved users.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Provides login/logout button integrating with Internet Identity and handling authentication states.
frontend/src/components/auth/UserProfile: Prompts new authenticated users to enter and save their profile name via a modal dialog.
frontend/src/components/deskboard/ClockC: Displays a live-updating clock and a simple monthly calendar grid.
frontend/src/components/errors/AppErrorB: React error boundary that catches component and global runtime errors and displays a recovery UI with reset and reload options.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppHeader: Header bar with logo, login, attendance navigation, and Excel workbook upload/replace handling.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Top-level layout component providing header, main content container, footer, and in-app reminder notifications.
frontend/src/components/layout/DesktopSi: Left sidebar navigation with tooltips for main, activity, and admin sections, highlighting the active tab.
frontend/src/components/reminders/InAppR: Displays popup reminder notifications with sound playback and dismiss controls.
frontend/src/components/reminders/TechHe: Shows an animated character image with fallback handling for load errors.
frontend/src/components/results/ResultRo: Modal for editing a table row, allowing cell-by-cell edits and saving updated row data.
frontend/src/components/search/ExploreHe: Panel displaying Google search results via iframe or fallback, with options to open results in a new tab.
frontend/src/components/table/DataPrevie: Scrollable preview table rendering sheet headers and rows with empty-state handling.
frontend/src/components/table/Horizontal: Provides a wrapper div that enables horizontal scrolling for wide table content.
frontend/src/components/updateChecking/U: Renders a search bar with keyword input, match‑type selector, and clear button for filtering update‑checking results.
frontend/src/components/vlookup/VlookupA: Generates and displays step‑by‑step VLOOKUP animation logic, controlling playback and showing lookup progress.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user’s identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useApproval.ts: Defines queries to check caller approval, admin status, and list approval records using the backend actor.
Provides mutations for requesting approval and updating approval status, with validation and query invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useAttendance.ts: Implements queries and mutations for attendance config, check‑in/out actions, and summary retrieval via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useAttendanceCalendar: Fetches all attendance entries and maps them into calendar events with formatted labels and metadata.
frontend/src/hooks/useCalendarEvents.ts: Implements placeholder calendar event queries and mutations, currently returning empty data due to missing backend support.
frontend/src/hooks/useHolidays.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching and managing holidays, including checks for identity and backend readiness.
frontend/src/hooks/useInAppReminderNotif: Implements in-app reminder polling with notification callbacks and cleanup of old notifications.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Defines an Internet Identity context and provider for authentication, exposing identity state and login/logout functions.
frontend/src/hooks/useProductivityMutati: Contains mutations for creating and deleting reminders and todos, with identity and actor readiness checks.
frontend/src/hooks/useProductivityQuerie: Maps backend productivity data into frontend formats and provides query hooks for reminders, todos, notes, and calendar events.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Supplies history-related queries and mutations, including listing, filtering, adding, and clearing history entries.
frontend/src/hooks/useRegularExpense.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching and mutating budgets and expenses, with validation and history logging.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserProfile.ts: Defines hooks to load and save the caller's user profile via the backend with React Query.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining color variables, theming, macOS-inspired UI styles, and deskboard background.
frontend/src/lib/attendance/attendancePd: Maps attendance summaries to PDF-ready structures and generates export filenames.
frontend/src/lib/attendance/dateRanges.t: Utilities for formatting dates, computing week/month/year ranges, and converting durations and timestamps.
frontend/src/lib/compare/compareWorkbook: Implements row, column, and key-based comparison between two workbook sheets, producing structured diff results.
frontend/src/lib/compare/filterCompariso: Filters comparison results by keyword using exact or contains matching.
frontend/src/lib/compare/normalizeRowSig: Generates deterministic row signatures and aligns rows to new header orders for workbook comparison.
frontend/src/lib/excel/normalizeHeader.t: Utilities to normalize, sanitize, and search Excel headers, including trimming, deduping, and generating fallback names.
frontend/src/lib/excel/parseWorkbook.ts: Loads SheetJS dynamically and parses an uploaded Excel file into sanitized sheet data with error handling.
Generates date‑range expense reports, computes totals, and prepares rows/headers for PDF export.
frontend/src/lib/export/branding.ts: Defines branding config and loads logo or watermark images/base64 for use in exports.
frontend/src/lib/export/exportPdf.ts: Loads jsPDF and creates branded PDF exports with headers, footers, and an optional centered watermark.
frontend/src/lib/export/exportXlsx.ts: Loads SheetJS and exports branded Excel workbooks with title and data rows.
frontend/src/lib/export/pdfCompanyInfo.t: Centralized company contact and footer details for PDF export branding.
frontend/src/lib/notes/noteEncoding.ts: Encodes and decodes note title/content into a single backend string using a separator.
frontend/src/lib/results/applyRowEdits.t: Applies user‑edited row overrides to a base dataset using index mapping.
frontend/src/lib/results/exportFilters.t: Provides helpers to get filterable columns/values and to filter rows by a selected column/value.
frontend/src/lib/results/historyExport.t: Formats history entries and exports them to Excel or PDF using shared exporters.
frontend/src/lib/vlookup/vlookup.ts: Implements a VLOOKUP utility supporting exact or approximate matching and multiple return columns.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AdminUsersTab.tsx: Provides an admin interface for viewing and updating user approval statuses with badges and actions.
frontend/src/pages/AttendanceTab.tsx: Implements attendance tracking UI with check-in/out, settings, summaries, calendar view, and holiday management.
frontend/src/pages/CalendarTab.tsx: Displays and manages user calendar events with create/delete dialogs and attendance overlays.
frontend/src/pages/DeskboardTab.tsx: Dashboard page integrating search, reminders, todos, notes, and calendar widgets with quick-add dialogs.
frontend/src/pages/HistoryTab.tsx: Displays user history entries with filtering, grouping, exporting, and clearing capabilities using various UI components and hooks.
frontend/src/pages/NotesTab.tsx: Manages user notes including creation, deletion, sorting, and error handling through dialogs and productivity hooks.
frontend/src/pages/RegularExpenseTab.tsx: Handles budget settings and regular expenses with CRUD operations, validation, reports, and PDF export features.
frontend/src/pages/RemindersTab.tsx: Provides creation and deletion of general reminders with validation and actor readiness checks.
frontend/src/pages/ResultsTab.tsx: Displays and edits result rows from various operations, supporting export to Excel/PDF and filtering options.
frontend/src/pages/SearchTab.tsx: Provides UI and logic for VLOOKUP and column filtering on the uploaded workbook, updating results and recording history.
frontend/src/pages/TodoTab.tsx: Displays and manages a user's to‑do list with create and toggle actions, handling authentication and error states.
frontend/src/pages/UpdateCheckingTab.tsx: Allows uploading a new Excel file and comparing it to the current one using a key column, then stores comparison results and history.
frontend/src/pages/UploadTab.tsx: Handles Excel workbook upload, parsing, sheet selection, and state replacement while recording upload history.
frontend/src/state/appState.tsx: Defines global app state for workbooks, search results, comparisons, uploads, and history with associated update functions.
frontend/src/utils/attendance/configMapp: Provides helpers to validate attendance config inputs and convert between hours/minutes and backend‑compatible seconds.
frontend/src/utils/errors/userFriendlyEr: Maps raw errors to clearer user‑friendly messages while logging full error details.
frontend/src/utils/number/parseNatBigInt: Parses and validates numeric strings into bigint for Nat types, returning errors for invalid input. Also provides a helper to validate input and return an error message or null.
frontend/src/utils/principal/parsePrinci: Parses unknown values into a Principal, validating strings and returning structured success or error results. Includes a helper to check if a value is a valid Principal.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, storing, and clearing URL and sessionStorage parameters, supporting both query and hash routing. Provides persistent parameter handling and hash cleanup.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, shadows, animations, and layout settings using plugins and custom theme values.
project_state.json: Project state file describing the project setup, known issues, and existing feature requirements for fixing admin user approval flow and adding validation.
